import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Table, Badge } from 'react-bootstrap'; const SchoolTimings = () => { const dailySchedule = [ { time: "7:30 AM - 8:00 AM", activity: "Morning Assembly", description: "Prayer, National Anthem, Announcements" }, { time: "8:00 AM - 8:45 AM", activity: "1st Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "8:45 AM - 9:30 AM", activity: "2nd Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "9:30 AM - 9:45 AM", activity: "Break", description: "Short Break" }, { time: "9:45 AM - 10:30 AM", activity: "3rd Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "10:30 AM - 11:15 AM", activity: "4th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "11:15 AM - 11:30 AM", activity: "Break", description: "Short Break" }, { time: "11:30 AM - 12:15 PM", activity: "5th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "12:15 PM - 1:00 PM", activity: "6th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "1:00 PM - 1:45 PM", activity: "Lunch Break", description: "Lunch and Recreation" }, { time: "1:45 PM - 2:30 PM", activity: "7th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "2:30 PM - 3:15 PM", activity: "8th Period", description: "Regular Classes" }, { time: "3:15 PM - 3:30 PM", activity: "Dispersal", description: "School Dismissal" } ]; const classTimings = [ { class: "Nursery - UKG", timing: "8:00 AM - 12:00 PM", days: "Monday - Friday" }, { class: "Class I - V", timing: "7:30 AM - 2:00 PM", days: "Monday - Friday" }, { class: "Class VI - VIII", timing: "7:30 AM - 3:00 PM", days: "Monday - Friday" }, { class: "Class IX - XII", timing: "7:30 AM - 3:30 PM", days: "Monday - Friday" } ]; const academicCalendar = [ { month: "April", events: "New Academic Year Begins, Orientation Program" }, { month: "May", events: "Summer Vacation (Mid-May to Mid-June)" }, { month: "June", events: "School Reopens, First Term Examinations" }, { month: "July", events: "Parent-Teacher Meetings, Sports Day" }, { month: "August", events: "Independence Day Celebrations, Mid-term Break" }, { month: "September", events: "Half-yearly Examinations" }, { month: "October", events: "Gandhi Jayanti, Diwali Holidays" }, { month: "November", events: "Annual Sports Meet, Cultural Events" }, { month: "December", events: "Winter Break, Christmas Celebrations" }, { month: "January", events: "School Reopens, Pre-board Examinations" }, { month: "February", events: "Board Examinations (Class X & XII)" }, { month: "March", events: "Annual Examinations, Results, Academic Year Ends" } ]; return (

School Timings

Daily schedule, class timings, and academic calendar information for Genesis School

{/* Class-wise Timings */}

Class-wise School Timings

 {classTimings.map((timing, index) => ( ))}
Class Timing Days
{timing.class} {timing.timing} {timing.days}
{/* Daily Schedule */}

Daily Schedule (Class I - XII)

 {dailySchedule.map((schedule, index) => ( ))}
Time Activity Description
{schedule.time} {schedule.activity} {schedule.description}
{/* Academic Calendar */}

Academic Calendar 2024-25

 {academicCalendar.map((month, index) => (
{month.month}

{month.events}

 ))} {/* Important Guidelines */}

Attendance Guidelines
  • Students must arrive 10 minutes before school starts
  • Late arrival requires permission from Principal
  • Minimum 75% attendance required for promotion
  • Medical leave requires doctor's certificate
  • Leave applications must be submitted in advance
  • Absence without prior notice is not acceptable

Holiday Guidelines
  • School follows CBSE holiday calendar
  • National and religious holidays are observed
  • Summer vacation: Mid-May to Mid-June
  • Winter vacation: Last week of December
  • Emergency holidays will be notified in advance
  • Make-up classes may be scheduled if needed
 {/* Emergency Procedures */}

Emergency Procedures

In case of emergency or unexpected school closure, parents will be notified through:

SMS

School Management System

Phone Call

Direct communication

Website

Official school website

Notice Board

School notice board

 ); }; export default SchoolTimings;
